div.p:
Tommy Tai Wee Fat
Temasek Polytechnic

We would like to congratulate, on this special occasion of the 10th Anniversary of AI3 and the 5th Anniversary of SOI Asia, the joint efforts and contributions of all partners and members in the past years that have helped grow the organizations to what it is today. It is our fervent hope that both AI3 and SOI Asia will continue to grow and expand, with TP playing an active role in the various research and developmental activities in the coming years.
